template.name: VCar
template.parameter: const int length, const xCoord_t x, yCoord_t y

transition.label: y + length < boardHeight && board[x][y + length] == FREE
MoveSouth(), t = 0

template.name: HCar
template.parameter: const int length, xCoord_t x, const yCoord_t y

transition.label: x + length < boardLength && board[x + length][y] == FREE
MoveEast(), t = 0
